body_html:
I can confirm that the problem is not confined to aggregate_ops_gpu.cu.cc. On my home Ubuntu 16.04 machine, if I
bazel build -k -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
I get ~190 instances of the same error (presumably that's almost all of the CUDA code).

The suggested fix works for me.

body:
I can confirm that the problem is not confined to aggregate_ops_gpu.cu.cc. On my home Ubuntu 16.04 machine, if I
bazel build -k -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer  
I get ~190 instances of the same error (presumably that's almost all of the CUDA code).

The suggested fix works for me.
